doctorannieautumn: This photo brought tears to my eyes. I am learning to renegotiate my sexuality after a double mastectomy (age 35) and it's a hard road, because my breasts were so central to my sexual life and practice. Do you have any suggestions for reading/theory on this???? I'm reading trans theory about remapping erogenous zones, but also wondering if there's anything else? Your inspiration to me is about queer embodiment and its relationship to BC treatment because I felt so alone and isolated and unrepresented . I try to put myself out there, to be visible, but there need to be many of us ❤️
